specs.title: should load options page successfully
should navigate between tabs
should load popup page successfully
should create a PAC script with all fields
should edit PAC script configuration
should delete PAC script configuration
should create multiple PAC scripts
should create manual proxy with single server
should create manual proxy with different protocols
should create manual proxy with bypass list
should activate and deactivate a proxy
should only allow one proxy active at a time
should toggle quick switch mode globally
should show quick switch area when enabled
should toggle "Disable Proxy on Startup" setting
should export (backup) configurations
should prevent saving proxy without name
should show validation for required fields
should allow selecting different colors
should display version information
should display statistics
should have working external links
should open and close configuration modal
should close modal with Escape key
should switch between PAC Script and Manual Configuration modes
should persist proxy configurations after page reload
should remember active tab after reload
should show proxy list in popup when quick switch enabled
should have dist folder with manifest
should have options page
should have popup page
should have background script
should have icons
should display empty state when no proxies configured
should load options page successfully
should create a PAC script configuration
should delete a proxy configuration
should edit an existing proxy configuration
should toggle quick switch mode globally
should export proxy configurations
should show error for invalid proxy configuration
